Hello world!

15 Sep 2014

Hi!

This is my first post on this blog here. After I realised, that my blog (thatsthaway.wordpress.com) became a little chaotic I decided to start a new one. It should be more organised and I also wanted to get rid of some older posts :P.

I hope you’ll enjoy reading my posts!

Markus Vieghofer

I love developing software. Most of the time I stick with Java and Android but I also try something new from time to time. I'm also on Twitter and Github.
